SQLResource.query: SELECT CODE_TP AS CODE_TP , CODE_CD AS CODE_CD , CODE_NM AS CODE_NM , BRAND_CD AS BRAND_CD , ACC_CD AS ACC_CD , USE_YN AS USE_YN FROM COMMON WHERE CODE_TP = '00000' AND CODE_CD = ${CODE_TP} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT C.CODE_TP AS CODE_TP , C.CODE_CD AS CODE_CD , C.CODE_NM AS CODE_NM , L.CODE_NM AS LANG_NM , C.BRAND_CD AS BRAND_CD , C.SORT_SEQ AS SORT_SEQ , C.ACC_CD AS ACC_CD , C.USE_YN AS USE_YN , NVL(U1.USER_NM, C.INST_USER) AS INST_USER , C.INST_DT AS INST_DT , NVL(U2.USER_NM, C.UPD_USER ) AS UPD_USER , C.UPD_DT AS UPD_DT , DECODE(L.CODE_CD, NULL, 'I', 'S') AS MULT_PRC FROM COMMON C, ( SELECT CODE_TP, CODE_CD, CODE_NM FROM LANG_COMMON WHERE CODE_TP = ${CODE_TP} AND LANGUAGE_TP = DECODE(${LANG_TP}, NULL, ' ', ${LANG_TP} ) AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) L, HQ_USER U1, HQ_USER U2 WHERE C.CODE_TP = L.CODE_TP(+) AND C.CODE_CD = L.CODE_CD(+) AND C.INST_USER = U1.USER_ID(+) AND C.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID(+) AND C.CODE_TP = ${CODE_TP} AND C.USE_YN LIKE ${USE_YN}
